notes: This initialization parameter is supported only on the Linux operating system.
This initialization parameter is available starting with Oracle Database 12c Release 2 (12.2.0.1).

property.Oracle RAC: The same value should be specified on all instances.

section:
OFS_THREADS sets the maximum number of Oracle file system (OFS) threads that can be started to service Oracle file system requests.

Note:

This initialization parameter is supported only on the Linux operating system.

Note:

This initialization parameter is available starting with Oracle Database 12c Release 2 (12.2.0.1).

Oracle Database Administrator’s Guide for more information about the Oracle Database NFS server feature
seealso: Oracle Database Administrator’s Guide for more information about the Oracle Database NFS server feature
